Label: Are there any issues or instructions regarding the receipt of the ET3 form?
HintText: For example the date it was due, the date it was received or any application for extension of time (Rule 18 and 20)

Label: Are there any issues or instructions regarding the respondent's name or identity?
Are there any issues or instructions regarding the jurisdiction codes?
Are there any issues or instructions regarding the applications?
Are there any issues or instructions regarding an Employerâ€™s Contract Claim?
Are there any issues or instructions regarding the prospects of the claim or response?
Are there any issues or instructions regarding the listing?
HintText: For example list for PH, if public or private and set out the issues to be determined with directions, in person or video

Label: Are there any issues or instructions where DDA or disability is disputed?
HintText: The claimant is to provide a statement - limited to 750 words, explaining the length of the disability, the nature of its effects upon daily activities and any existing medical evidence relied upon - the the respondent by [date]. The respondent should state their position on disability, giving reasons for any denial, by [date]

Label: Should either side be ordered to provide any further information?
Are there any issues or instructions to consider or final orders to be given?
HintText: For example, Rule 50, transfer to another region, interpreters, adjustments required for hearing
